synopsis.text: Two years after banishing the darkness, Shu has been unable to use his shadow the Blue Dragon's powers. He and Bouquet join the resistance against General Logi's successor, Rosekstan. However, the world faces chaos again. By chance, they meet Noi, a mysterious boy pursued by a red dragon. Rescuing Noi, they discover he can restore their shadows. With revived powers, Shu, Bouquet, and Noi journey to reveal the dragons' purpose and mysteries. Facing trials that threaten humanity's survival, they must stop the events unfolding and overcome challenges on their quest.
